Get all checklists of a trip. Results can optionally be sorted by title.
Adds a new checklist to the trip.
Deletes a checklist of a trip. User must delete all checklist items before deleting the checklist.
Get all items belonging to a trip checklist.
Adds a user or planedia checklist item to a checklist.
Deletes an item from the checklist. All answers to that item in the trip will be deleted too.
Get answers of a trip checklist. Results can be sorted by 'id', 'user_id' or 'item_id'
Changes user answer to a trip checklist item

item.name: Add member (invite by email) to trip

request.description: Get all checklist items of the current logged in user. Results can be sorted by title.
Adds a checklist item to the current logged in user.
Delete a checklist item of the current logged in user.

item.name: Change note place in day timeline
Sort timeline points in place for day
